common_0320_rival_02:
We should call and catch each other up on how
things are going from now on![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0320_rival_03:
You decided to set out heading west from the
school, right, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0320_rival_04:
Starting from there, you’ll be pretty close to
Cortondo.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0320_rival_05:
That’s where you’ll find the Bug-type Gym!
You can go take on the Gym Leader if you want![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0320_rival_06:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I’m sure you can beat her,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]!\r
Good\r
luck—I’ll\r
call\r
ya soon![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0320_friend_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello? This is [VAR TRNAME(0000)]’s
phone,\r
right?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0320_friend_02:
It’s me—Arven! I was a bit worried ’bout whether
or not you’d managed to set out yet.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0320_friend_03:
You did end up deciding to set out east, right?
After leaving the school?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0320_friend_04:
If so, you’re not that far from the area where the
Stony Cliff Titan is said to make its lair.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0320_friend_05:
Stories say it clings to cliffs—practically becomes
part of the stone—then attacks from above![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0320_friend_06:
Though...maybe don’t be staring up overhead all
the time looking for a Titan, only to go tumbling\r
off some cliff you didn’t see.\c
If that ever does happen, you can open your map
app and call yourself a Flying Taxi to pick you up.\c
Some of those rocky areas are like a real maze,
so try not to get lost, little buddy.\c
And if you find a Titan, let me know![VAR 0114(0006)]
